## Installation

To install using `devtools`;

```R
devtools::install_github("wilsontom/pickeR")
```
or from source;

```sh
git clone https://github.com/wilsontom/pickeR
R CMD build pickeR
R CMD INSTALL pickeR_0.1.0.tar.gz
```
